reference.title: Random Number Generator

section.p: The Frame Controller (FRC) implements a random number generator that uses entropy gathered from noise in the RF receive chain. The data is suitable for use in cryptographic applications.
Below is the con key ref from submap --------------
Output from the random number generator can be used either directly or as a seed or entropy source for software-based random number generator algorithms such as Fortuna.
